name: tanggal
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool masehi_ke_hijriyah.
Tool description: convert tanggal Masehi to Hijriyah 
API description: Converts a given Gregorian date to its Hijri equivalent using the Masehi-ke-Hijriyah API.

tanggal.description: The Gregorian date to be converted to Hijri.
